Davenport to host riverfront fireworks display July 3 after Red White & Boom gets canceled

As Independence Day fireworks shows are canceled due to concerns of spreading the coronavirus, the City of Davenport says the show must go on.

Link: /article/news/local/davenport-to-host-riverfront-fireworks-display-july-3-after-red-white--boom-gets-canceled/526-a3ab89a9-88d5-433d-bdf4-bcde9894ab66
